qas.question: Why has their been distance between the Premier League and the Football League?

answers.text: in large part to the disparity in revenue from television rights between the leagues,

qas.question: Did many new teams in the Premier League have any difficulties in their initial season?

answers.text: many newly promoted teams have found it difficult to avoid relegation in their first season in the Premier League.

qas.question: Was it unusual for a new team to go back to the Football League after their first season in the Premier League?

answers.text: In every season except 2001–02 and 2011–12, at least one Premier League newcomer has been relegated back to the Football League.

qas.question: In the 1997-98 season how many new teams had to go back to the Football League?

answers.text: In 1997–98 all three promoted clubs were relegated at the end of the season.
